call_title: Dev Update July 1 2024 | Live Ergoversary w/Marc the Shark

decisions.decision: Make mining great again hats will be red with white print matching the Trump hat font with Ergo logo on back
decisions.speaker: Marc the Shark
decisions.context: Planning merchandise for Rare Evo event
decisions.quote: We're making hats for the event. It's going to say, make mining great again... They're going to be red with white print. It's going to look just like it. We're going to match the font.

decisions.decision: Will order 100 hats and give away every fifth one to break even
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.quote: 100 hats we're getting... We might do something where we give away every five, so maybe we'll give away 20 hats in total

commitments.commitment: Put up proposal on Paideia for mining pool DAO framework

commitments.commitment: Put up Paideia proposal for Sigmanauts to fund the hats
commitments.quote: We're going to put in a Paideia proposal for the Sigmanauts

commitments.commitment: Run mining pool on ergo-miners.com domain on Flux
